name: locusmaps-sdk
description: This project contains a small script which can be used to initialize and control a LocusMaps instance. See https://locuslabs.com/ for more information.
author: Glenn Crownover <crownover@locuslabs.com>

scripts.build-es6: mkdir -p dist && rollup -f es -i src/sdk.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/LocusMapsSDK.js
scripts.build-umd: mkdir -p dist && rollup -f umd -n LMInit -i src/sdk.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/LocusMapsSDK-umd.js
